name: 楊銘基
objective:
本課程共分車用電機(含車用直流馬達、無刷直流馬達、同步馬達及其驅動器介紹，馬達位置、轉速及扭矩控制)、車用電池技術(含電池分類、電池化學、電池檢驗及測試、新式電池及燃料電池)、電池充放電系統(充電器、發電機、充放電特性)、車輛電能管理、車輛感測器應用五部份內容。
This course includes five parts: Vehicle electrical motor (Incl. dc motor, brushless dc motor, synchronous motor, and motor actuator, control of position, speed, and torque), Vehicle battery technology (battery types, electro-chemical technology, testing, alternative batteries, and fuel cell), Battery charging system (charger, generator and charging characteristics), Vehicle energy management system (EMS), and Applications of vehicle sensors.
